hero.description: Drag the pieces into place to complete the festive puzzle.

completion.perfect: Perfect! You put all 22 pieces together in {{time}}!
completion.perfectDescription:
You didn't just save our stag, but also did a good deed – We'll convert this into real coins and donate the amount to a charity organization.
Would you like to submit your time, or do you think you can do it even faster?

modals.stagProblem: Oh no – something's wrong with our oh22 Christmas stag…
modals.explosionTitle: Our oh22 Christmas stag has fallen apart!
modals.explosionDescription: Help us put the 22 scattered pieces back together so our stag can deliver all the Christmas presents on time.

instructions.drag: Drag the pieces with the mouse to the correct position.
